derivation: or (fully) אֱלִיהוּא; from H410 (אֵל) and H1931 (הוּא); God of him;
outline:
Elihu = "He is my God"
  1. the younger man who rebuked Job and his three friends
  2. an Ephraimite, Samuel's great grandfather
  3. a Manassite warrior chief for David
  4. son of Shemaiah and Korhite gatekeeper
  5. David's brother
strongs_def: Elihu, the name of one of Job's friends, and of three Israelites
